subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Third baseman Miguel Cabrera of the Detroit Tigers has a realistic chance to win the first triple crown in the major leagues since Carl Yastrzemski in 1967.
snippet: Third baseman Miguel Cabrera of the Detroit Tigers has a realistic chance to win the first triple crown in the major leagues since Carl Yastrzemski in 1967.
